prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        After mapping ingredients, optionally rewrite the cooking steps to reference the chosen products.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_3b4f9k",
  "name": "Solo Quick Bites Flex",
  "core_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "SouthAfrican",
      "ModernAmerican"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],
    "Allergens": [
      "Gluten"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "10-Min Garlic Mushroom 7-Grain Bowl with Chutney & Feta",
  "description": "A quick one-pan grain bowl with sautéed mushrooms and spinach, finished with a mild South African chutney lift and crumbled feta. Balanced, budget-friendly, and ready in under 15 minutes.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "instructions": [
    "Heat a nonstick pan over medium-high heat and add olive oil.",
    "Add onion and cook 2 minutes until starting to soften.",
    "Stir in garlic and mushrooms; cook 3–4 minutes until mushrooms release liquid and brown lightly.",
    "Add spinach and a pinch of salt and pepper; toss 30–60 seconds until just wilted.",
    "Warm the 7-grain medley (microwave pouch per pack directions, or stir into the pan with a splash of water for 1–2 minutes).",
    "Add the warmed 7-grain medley to the pan, stir in chutney, and cook 30–60 seconds to combine.",
    "Remove from heat, squeeze over lemon, adjust salt and pepper, and top with crumbled feta.",
    "Serve immediately in a bowl."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1/4 small",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "1 clove",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mushrooms",
      "quantity": "120 g",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "1 heaped cup",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "7-grain medley",
      "quantity": "1 cup cooked (about 125 g if using a pouch)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chutney",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1 wedge",
      "preparation": "for squeezing"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "feta",
      "quantity": "30 g",
      "preparation": "crumbled"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt and pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighFiber"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
